summary: Dracula travels to the American West, intent on making a beautiful ranch owner his next victim. Her fiance, outlaw Billy the Kid, finds out about it and rushes to save her.
cast: John Carradine|Chuck Courtney|Melinda Casey|Virginia Christine|Walter Janovitz|Bing Russell|Olive Carey|Roy Barcroft|Hannie Landman|Richard Reeves|Marjorie Bennett|William Forrest|George Cisar|Harry Carey Jr.|Leonard P. Geer|William Challee|Charlita|Max Kleven|Jack Williams
keywords: horror western|vampire cowboy|evil cowboy|psychotronic film|billy the kid character
title: Billy the Kid Versus Dracula
